review: Works as advertised and I am happy I made the purchase
author: CAM

review: Very easy to set up, user friendly, happy with the content, nice being able to easily move the stick to different tvs or other devices.
author: Amanda Cheavens

review: Fire tv stick is awesome.  It really has exceeded all expectations.  I have owned a chromecast for a long time now, this is way better
author: matt

review: When it wants to...it works great. However it gets very hot, and needs more RAM. It often freezes up and I then have to restart it.
author: LivinItUp

review: Did not have luck with i . May try agai .

review: I thought I would get everything on Netflix.  I didn't realize I had to pay for some of it.

review: This is the absolute best product if you are a prime member!  Wow!

review: Works Amazing! got this for free when we signed up for SlingTV and I love it
